articles.author: Sandra Lilley
articles.title: A record surge in dengue cases in Latin America spurs a warning - NBC News
articles.description: A record surge in dengue cases throughout Latin America and the Caribbean this year prompted the head of the Pan American Health Organization to call for collective action to curb the deadly mosquito-borne viral disease.
